Action.Param1: Customer is adding value to their gift card.
Customer is adding value to their gift card.

Message.Name: ExOrderNoOrders
Message.Language: There are no orders stored for this card. Please order with cashier.
No hay pedidos almacenados para esta tarjeta. Por favor pedido pagarle al cajero.

Message.Name: BadCardSwipe
Message.Language: Card not recognized. Please swipe your card again.
Tarjeta no reconicida. Por favor pase la tarjeta por el lector.

Message.Name: SwipeCard
Message.Language: Please swipe a valid card to use for payment
Por favor pase una tarjeta de crédito válida por el lector.

Message.Name: InvalidCardType
Message.Language: This type of card is not accepted. Please swipe a valid card.
Este tipo de tarjeta no es aceptada. Por favor pase una tarjeta válida por el lector.

Message.Name: ExOrderJoin?
Message.Language: Would you like to join Express Order?

Message.Name: ExOrderMissingItems
Message.Language: %s item(s) previously ordered is no longer available

Message.Name: ExOrderMissingAllItems
Message.Language: There are no items in this order that are available
Los artículos en este pedido no están disponible.

Message.Name: TouchMessage
Message.Language: Then touch "FOR HERE" or "TO GO" to make your selection.
Luego oprima "PARA AQUÍ" o "PARA LLEVAR" para elegir.

Message.Name: Pay Cashier
Message.Language: Customer has chosen to pay by cashier. Touch here to close this message box.
El cliente ha pedido pagarle al cajero

Message.Name: UsingExpressOrder
Message.Language: Customer is using Express Order. Touch here to close this message box.

Message.Name: PayWithCard
Message.Language: You can pay with your card.
Puede pagar con su tarjeta de crédito.

Message.Name: OrPayWithCash
Message.Language: Or you can pay with cash.

Message.Name: ExpressOrderDescription
Message.Language: Express Order allows you to use your card to store your favorite orders. See the cashier for more information.
'Pedido Rapido' le permite usar su tarjeta para almacenar sus pedidos favoritos. Hable con el cajero para más información.

Message.Name: CreditCardDenied
Message.Language: Unable to process card. Please swipe a valid card.
No pudimos procesar su tarjeta. Por favor pase una tarjeta válida por el lector.

Message.Name: CreditCardExpired
Message.Language: Your card has expired. Please swipe a valid card.
Su tarjeta ha expirado. Por favor pase una tarjeta válida por el lector.

Message.Name: ProcessingCard
Message.Language: Procesando su tarjeta de crédito. Espere un momento por favor.

Message.Name: CreditNetworkDown
Message.Language: The credit network is not responding. Please try again later.
La red de crédito no está disponible. Por favor intente otra vez un poco más tarde.

Message.Name: Keypad Instructions1
Message.Language: 1) Take a table tent from the counter.
1) Tome una tienda de mesa del mostrador.

Message.Name: Keypad Instructions2
Message.Language: 2) Enter the number using the keypad.
2) Entre el número usando el teclado.

Message.Name: IfPayingWithCredit
Message.Language: If you are paying with a card, please swipe now.
Si piensa pagar con crédito, por favor pase su tarjeta por el lector ahora.

Message.Name: EnterTotalInstructions1
Message.Language: 1. Enter amount to add to your gift card.
1. Introducza importe a añadir a tarjeta.

Message.Name: SwipeCCForGiftCard
Message.Language: Please swipe a credit card to add value to your gift card.
Pase una tarjeta de crédito para añadir valor a tarjeta de regalo.

Message.Name: ChargeCCForGiftCardConfirm
Message.Language: Your card has been charged and that amount has been added to your gift card.
Su tarjeta ha sido cargado con el valor introducido.

Message.Name: InsufficientFundsOnGiftCard
Message.Language: Please swipe another card to pay the remaining balance due.
Pase otra tarjeta para pagar el balance.

Message.Name: OrderCanceled_GiftCard
Message.Language: Your order has been canceled. Please come again.
Orden cancelado. Por favor, visítenos otra vez.

Message.Name: WaitingForTotalApproval
Message.Language: Waiting for customer to approve total amount. Touch here to close this message box.

Message.Name: MyMenuHeader2
Message.Language: Your Favorite Items. The Way You Like Them.
Sus Artículos Favoritos. De La Manera Que Le Gustan.

Message.Name: PromptedItemsmodalMessage
Message.Language: Please make sure that a %s is available before continuing.
Por favor asegúrese de que hay %s antes de continuar.
